title: Power-Law Inflation from the Rolling Tachyon
abstract: Modeling the potential by an inverse square law in terms of the tachyon field ($V(T)=\beta T^{-2}$) we find exact solution for spatially flat isotropic universe.We show that for $\beta>2\sqrt{3}/3$ the model undergoes power-law inflation. A way to construct other exact solutions is specified and exemplified.
